      int[] noOfRooms)
        Creates a hotel object.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the hotel
        location - the location of the hotel
        rating - the hotel's rating, from 1-5 stars
        roomDetails - an array containing the room details
        noOfRooms - an array containing the number of rooms in the hotel
